updateInfo.title: Stylistically Superior
updateInfo.desc: Caravan is all about ~style~ and we got loads of it in this update, along with regular performance improvements.

updateInfo.title: Supercharged Sidebar
updateInfo.desc: Use compact sidebar? You'll see a new, more consistent design that shows a fancy tooltip with link names.

updateInfo.title: Course Navigation
updateInfo.desc: Laptop and desktop users: you'll see a new design for the expanded course navigation bar, which shows the active page in the sleek style of the rest of the app. If your window is resized too small, you'll see the expandable version.

updateInfo.title: Cracking Modules
updateInfo.desc: Course modules have been re-stylized to be easier to read and use. The 10 item and module limit still persists.

updateInfo.title: Features on the Side
features: The dashboard now uses significantly less bandwidth.
App-wide optimization means much less data is used and pages load significantly faster.
Refreshing certain pages will no longer result in 404's.
